Posts.Content: mintchocchip wrote: Hello everyone greatful to have found this site - thanks "bugs".  DX on 8/30 waiting for additional tests MRI, bloodwork.  Can anyone tell me how the heck do deal with your husband and children during all this waiting? Getting annoyed by the poo poo "oh eveything will turn out ok". I realize they "dont get it" and think I am nothing special because thousands of people deal with this every day, but isnt ok to feel sorry for yourself a little bit? Mint Chocolate Chip ice cream is one of my happy places Dx 8/30/2010, IDC, 3cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 1, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: A screeching hault mintchocchip msphil
